title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. tit. 16, ch. I, subch. A, pt. 6 - Implementation Of Provisions Of The Public Officers Law
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. tit. 16, ch. I, subch. A, pt. 6 - Implementation Of Provisions Of The Public Officers Law

State Regulations

Subpart 6-1 - Public Access to Department Records (§ 6-1.1 to 6-1.4)

Subpart 6-2 - Personal Privacy Protection (§ 6-2.1 to 6-2.11)

Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. tit. 16, ch. I, subch. A, pt. 6

Statutory authority: Public Officers Law, §§
87[1][b], 94[2]; Public Service Law, §§ 4[1], 5[2], 7[1], 16[1], 20[1]
State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
